source.cd2fadbf:
**In this kernal, I will make a simplified analysis of happiness in Egypt, and I will clarify it through drawing and by showing the proportions on it in order to clarify some important things that are important to every person interested in these ratios.**

![image](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcRq1Ahs9NDT-dJMQ3Ne8xeOT05QVrBEfFqisA&usqp=CAU)
source.92a08e5c: **The World Happiness Report is a landmark survey of the state of global happiness . The report continues to gain global recognition as governments, organizations and civil society increasingly use happiness indicators to inform their policy-making decisions. Leading experts across fields – economics, psychology, survey analysis, national statistics, health, public policy and more – describe how measurements of well-being can be used effectively to assess the progress of nations. The reports review the state of happiness in the world today and show how the new science of happiness explains personal and national variations in happiness.**
